contents.class: inline text-sm font-normal text-white italic p

contents.text: Here is a combination Land and Sea tour featuring a day full of adventure and sightseeing across the Eastern Cyprus spectacular coastal frontier. A jeep safari based voyage that takes in the Cape Greko landmarks while challenging you to solve tasks and encounters.
This tour has been combined with a fun treasure hunt theme to create a team building tour like no other.

This fun-filled, entertaining treasure hunt is designed to bring out your inner pirate, encourage communication skills and above all inspire a spirit of team work. Solve the pirate-themed challenges in order to snatch the treasure from under your opponentâ€™s noses!

The treasure hunt adventure does not end with the 4 x 4 off-road adventure, it continues with an unforgettable cruise on the thrilling Pirate boat along the East coast taking in the sea dwellers, Ghost Town Famagusta from a distance, the crystal clear waters, enlivening swim stop at the blue lagoon and a scrumptious buffet lunch and wine included.
Non-stop thrills, some light trekking, swimming and tons of fun and chill out time. The only way to win is to combine your strengths and work together!
Maps, questioners, props and prizes will all be provided.

leading-none font-normal tracking-tight italic text-light-grey text-4xl font-serif

contents.text: In order to fulfil your missions, your team will need to find the treasure by following instructions and solving riddles.
A unique way to discover the Cypriot hidden treasures, in breath-taking surroundings. Perfect for those who want to learn and explore.
When everyone finishes and the treasure is found the winners will be announced and will receive their gift.
Compete in all adventure activities against your fellow teams.
Follow directions and instructions that will eventually lead you to the treasure.
Solve the riddles based on the clues, information and observation.
Transfer and transportation as per itinerary
English speaking tour guide (other languages may be available upon request)
Personal expenses such as: additional refreshments along the way, souvenirs, products
